website_summaries.verdict: This is a functional indoor system with local storage and no monthly fees. A great deal for those on a budget.
pros: Able to pan 360 degrees and offers 1080p HD video with 16GB of built-in data
Provides temperature and humidity data, a bluetooth speaker for music and two-way audio, and two sensors to alert you if a door or window is open
cons: Not always easy to set up with your home router, but customer support is responsive
App can be slow and a little unreliable

website_summaries.verdict: Get the Zmodo Pivot if you prefer local storage and want to be able to pan around an entire room on demand.
pros: 24/7 recording, 16GB of internal storage, 360-degree motion sensors and panning capabilities, two included door/window sensor accessories and a Bluetooth speaker give the $150 Zmodo Pivot an edge over the competition
cons: The Pivot doesn't currently have cloud storage or work with any products/platforms from smart-home manufacturers
The app is also a little tricky to navigate

customer_reviews.title: Although only 16GB, it is upgradable (see pics)
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product with lots to offer. The only thing missing is an SD card slot since 16GB is not enough in my opinion. The good news is, there is an SD slot inside if you are adventurous enough to it take it apart. I have attached pictures of the steps. Remember to format the card correctly before installing.
customer_reviews.author: RxJock

customer_reviews.title: Now Useless
customer_reviews.text: This product worked flawlessly until a recent update severely limited its abilities, in a deliberate step to force customers to subscribe to their cloud service. In spite of the built in storage, all captured video is now erased after 24 hours. Unless, of course, you pay for the cloud. What a rip-off!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The rotation of camera was painful slow. I mean great concept it just isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Avoid at all cost. Tech support: was on hold for 45 min then they hung up on me. The door contacts are cheap you can tell because of the type of magnet they use. WIFI I couldn't get it to connect to my wifi unless my password had a special character. After their firmware it worked but barely. I would get alerts several hours later. The rotation of camera was painful slow. I mean great concept it just isn't there with this product.
customer_reviews.author: IGotzurReviewRighthee

customer_reviews.title: Customer dis-service is the absolute worst.
customer_reviews.text: One door sensor dead on arrival. Customer dis-service is the absolute worst ever. Hold times over 2 hours. A stock email reply 2 days later. Constant false motion alarms. I pointed it at a plain wall, no pets and nobody home and had 10 false motion alarms. Fantastic concept poorly executed. Just say no.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Momma

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to be able to monitor my dogs while I was at work and eventually ended up using this for security out of my front window due to some ding dong ditchers. The pivot barely functions right, it's glitchy as all get out. It clicks, very loudly, when it does move. Zmodo's tech support is terrible. You can barely talk to anyone and the ones you can talk to hardly ever know their products. Terrible service.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMMRomance

customer_reviews.title: Love the live scan!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these(2) Pivots for a while, not having time to install them. I just recently installed one of the two. It's recording is very clear and I love the "Live" scan. I have other cameras installed, also. The pivot seems to register motion more easily in daylight, but not in dark with the night vision. A live scan in the dark, however, is very clear. It's much easier and quicker to live scan with the Pivot than with the other remote control cameras! I am happy with them and will install the other very soon in another room. We use the cameras to monitor my 85 yr old mother in law with dementia.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Stear clear
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted three months and now will not connect to network. It was working fine and then with no warning just stopped. the rings light up however the unit will not connect to anything. If it lasted for more than three months it would be a good product however I do no see paying $100 dollars every three months for a device that just breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Redfern

customer_reviews.title: At firts it was GREAT, but now it keeps losing its best features.
customer_reviews.text: At firts it was GREAT, but now it keeps losing its best features. With the last few updates I lost, first, the possibility of see the recording of the last 24 hours for free, and then, with the sensors alerts, the possibility of seeing a short video of what happened and what triggered the sensor. Now I can only see those short videos of the motion alerts. It seems your doing everything to make us paid for a subscription, which I won't. That was one of the key features of your product that decided my purchase. I'm starting to feel disappointed with a product at first I loved and recommended a lot. But now it just keeping worst and worst.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Zunni

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of junk, I've had for a year and had to setup twice because of moving. the 1st time took all day to get the device to connect. So many issues with how the setup works for this thing. trying to get the device to register a bar code populated from the app as you sit there pointing it at the camera and it does nothing. After moving I had to set the device up again and after enough frustration this thing is in the trash. Worst product, there are so many better ways the device could have been setup for use than trying to get it to scan a bar code off your phone.
customer_reviews.author: ryan felt

customer_reviews.title: Item looks good and has great promise
customer_reviews.text: Item looks good and has great promise, but I have spent more time trying to set this up than a 10,000 piece Jigsaw puzzle! First, the Zmodo app wouldn't work and I was told to use meshare app to video from the Pivot camera. Then camera hardware updates broke the meshare app so I started using the Zmodo app. Then an update with the Zmodo app caused the app to stop streaming video. Customer service wasn't very helpful. They will not acknowledge an issue with the software or that the issue is with my mobile device or network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got it connect but now it won't stop moving back and forth. I spent 2 hours on hold for customer support only to be hung up on without speaking to someone. The live chat got no response. This will likely be going back unless it magically starts working properly. Customer support seems the be a joke! Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all reliable. We set it up right next to our modem and router and it still missed about 75 of the motion that was taking place in our home as our pet sitter came and went. The whole reason we purchased was so we could observe. Most days it never even registered her coming in and out of the front door and when it did, there was enough of a delay that she would be in the next room before it would capture video. Don't waste your money. Sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: designer2be

customer_reviews.title: This was a really nice thing to have when we went on vacation and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. A little finicky with internet connections sometimes, but my house is that way with a lot of different wi-fi devices. The door and window triggers have to be VERY close together when the door or window is closed, so keep that in mind when you are setting it all up. This was a really nice thing to have when we went on vacation and wanted to keep an eye on our dogs. Gave us great peace of mind as I am the type of person that worries a lot! Will be expanding our home more in the coming months with the doorbell camera and some general cameras. Zmodo is my go-to, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Britain

customer_reviews.title: This is a good, solid camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid, indoor camera. It looks nice sitting on a shelf and blends in better than my others. Really nice quality picture. This app responds quickly and it’s all pretty intuitive. The door sensors work well as long as they get good signal, obviously. The only downside is not being able to store to my own server. Tilt would be a real nice feature to add on the next version but the field of view is pretty good without it, so it hasn’t been a big deal, other than a few times. It has a much better talk-back speaker quality than my Foscam. When I have a 1 bar LTE signal, I can still connect.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I own an Arlo Pro and a Foscam System and by far the best camera setup I have is my Zmodo cameras. What makes them so good is that they stay synced with my modem, even when the IP address changes. I use these cameras in our vacation home and it is a two hour trip to fix a problem. I also like the temperature and humidity data provided when the house is shut down in our mountain vacation home in the winter. I highly recommend these Zmodo cameras because they are good and very affordable! Setup is also very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Really well-priced, high quality surveillance equipment. I feel just like Big Brother!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how ANYONE who is smart gave this anything but a rave review. Software works as well as expected on both of our iPhones (6 and 7 plus). Great confidence builder. Far preferred over monitored systems...this is real-time monitoring, high quality image and you get to yell at thieves if they are inside your house (as well as say hello to your spouse when surveilling their faithfulness)! Really well-priced, high quality surveillance equipment. I feel just like Big Brother!
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Gray(scale)

customer_reviews.title: Not all it is hyped up to be.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as not needing a subscription service, but the reality is they limit the record time to an unusable 10 seconds or so. You can barely get a glimpse of people before the recording stops unless you pay for the cloud service. Will have to look for alternatives. Sadly I am into ZMODO products for over $400 at this point.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of these cameras over the past couple of years. They have all had glitches in their software, were difficult to set up, the cameras didn't work or there was a huge delay in the picture and audio. This Zmodo was a snap to set up, first attempt!, no software glitches and just a slight delay in the picture and audio. I would recommend this camera. Good value and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing.....
customer_reviews.text: Overall I've had nothing but problems with the Pivot. Majority of the time it won't link to the phone app. When I do get it to work with the app, it doesn't follow my designated notification settings. The picture quality is pretty good and the sound from the speaker isn't bad. Customer service is really bad when I have problems or questions. I haven't had it but a year and it's already broken at the power supply connection.
customer_reviews.author: bullybabe13

customer_reviews.title: Never worked 100% Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I suspect I got a bad device as I was never able to get the window sensors to connect to the camera. Despite that the camera did function, the images/video were decent, night vision was good enough to catch my son sneaking into the pantry to eat sugar in the middle of the night and it detected motion throughout the room even if that motion was only a change in light due to passing clouds. I liked that no cloud subscription service was required and that it had it's own built in storage. Disappointing however, that the window sensors never worked.
customer_reviews.author: MattK

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made door sensors... Cause of some plastic the while gadget is not working...
customer_reviews.text: 9 months after purchase the so called door sensors malfunctioned. The funny part is what actually did go wrong. The plastic that holds the battery in place broke off piece by piece until the battery can no longer stay in place, thus no power source present... Tried anything that comes to mind to make that battery just sit in there but to no success... So now I have to pocket out $30 on top to replace this flimsy product accessory or have no more door sensors....
customer_reviews.author: Yavor Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: This was a decent camera before the software update. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent camera before the software update. This camera does not work at all any longer. If you check Android store reviews you will find all the same issue. Do not purchase!!! Update, they sent me an RMA camera that had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Plesco

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Returned after this wouldn't connect with my network. I have a computer science degree for reference and am knowledgeable in networking. I was on hold for 30 minutes and spent another 20 minutes trying to troubleshoot with no success. The company offered a replacement but I started looking at alternatives based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'm not sure there's anything comparable in terms of features and quality, though this is the only device of the type that I own. Set up was simple and quick and image quality is quite good. Sound quality (speaker) is sufficient for talking/speech. My only dislike is that the turning rate is somewhat slow, such that when one of the door triggers is tripped, by the time the camera spins to see what's happening, a person could easily, at a normal pace, enter and already be out of view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BOTHER!! Read the negative reviews. Non functional for me...unable to connect to my router.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to connect the to router...despite consulting my relative who is a computer and electrical engineer. He also could not set up the camera and recommended that I return the item. 10/17. Addendum. I purchased a second unit foolishly because Of the reviews and the assumption that the first unit was defective ....again same result. Returned because it was also unable to connect to the wifi. CAVEAT EMPTOR.10/22/17 update...bought Amcrest system....easy setup and excellent app.
customer_reviews.author: Stap

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Bad app.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for about 9 months, and overall, I really like the camera itself. It's small and quiet, and the motion-detection works great. My only complaint about the operation is that the motion detection stays on even when the camera is inactive, and it makes this annoying clicking sound. That brings me to my main complaint, which is with the app. In addition to the camera staying on even when I set it to be inactive, the app frequently indicates that there are notifications when there aren't. More customization options would be nice. When I contacted the company about the issues, they offered to set up a customer service call but then failed to follow through.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of GARBAGE. ALERTS DO NOT WORK/EXTREMELY SPORADIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: They camera itself is great. Picture quality is good and works through the app fine. But the reason why I bought it is to get alerted when someone enters my home while I'm away. No alerting out of the box. Ran through 2 upgrades to get to the lastest firmware. Alerts worked twice out of 30-40 tests. And support?! Lol support is terrible. Good luck with an 88 minute wait for support. I had other issue with the camera/app as well, but those are all secondary as alerting doesn't work. I'll just take my money back.
customer_reviews.author: RON SAKA

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first, now not so much (RETURNED IT)
customer_reviews.text: So my neighbor had told me about this camera and so I picked it up and I loved it at first. It was a beast to setup even with my engineer neighbor that who had set one up before. So the quality is awesome and WHEN it worked it was awesome. The problem being that it constantly was timing out or no network connecting and we have great internet. So what is the point of having it if you can't use it all the time. So we returned It and going to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: WOULD DEFINITELY WOULD NOT RECOMMEND IT HAD A, GREAT PICTURE..SEE UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING CAPABILITY FOR PRICE! HAD A COMMON SENSE QUESTION, BUT COULD NOT FIND ANSWER, THEIR TECH SUPPORT WAS MOST HELPFUL, RESPECTFUL AND WILLING TO OFFER ANY ASSISTANCE NEEDED, GREAT PURCHASE!!10/7 I AM UPDATING MY REVIEW AFTER HAVING RECEIVED A 2nd AS A GIFT & PURCHASING A NEW ROUTER THIS HAS BEEN A NIGHTMARE! CAN'T ACCESS ON APP, STATES IT REC'VD NEW WIFI UPDATE THEN ASKS FOR IT AGAIN WITHIN MINS? VERY DISAPPOINTED AND ONE OF THEM A COUPLE MONTHS OLD (GIFT) HAS NEVER FUNCTIONED FOR MORE THEN A FEW DAYS? TRIED TO ASK FOR HELP BUT REC'VD A REJECTION FOR ASSISTANCE? THERE HAS TO BE BETTER OPTIONS!
customer_reviews.author: AngelYOD

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating device
customer_reviews.text: Can't express how disappointed I am with this camera. Extremely hard to connect to right off the bat, couldn't get it to connect even on a 2.4ghz channel. After hours of working on it finally randomly connected. Worked for a few months before just stopping. Sent it to, zmodo on my own dime. Got a new one in the mail today and guess what 3 hours later I still can't get it to connect again, just times out everytime. Very disappointed with my first zmodo purchase. Wish I could return it or atleast try the new cloud model.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Liechti

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay for a couple of days then wouldn't connect ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for a couple of days then wouldn't connect to the app. I tried resetting the camera multiple times, moved it to different locations throughout the house, and nothing seemed to do the trick. I reached out to Zmodo support, and there suggestions were the same that I had already tried. Returning this and purchasing a more expensive camera; I was excited to save money, but I'd rather spend more and have a product that works well.
customer_reviews.author: krl

customer_reviews.title: The best in the market!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my home and I really love the 360 view of my place, the Window/door sensors are also very convenient by automatically notifying me via alert if they are triggered when the door opens or closes! I truly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a camera that can capture a 360 view of their place. The Bluetooth capability is also a plus!! I even went out of my way and purchased a Pivot Pro!
customer_reviews.author: J. Money

customer_reviews.title: 7 Hours of trying and I am giving up
customer_reviews.text: I tried to hook this up to my network and even though I have a Zmodo camera that works this will not. I called AT&T technical support and worked with them to make sure all the specifics you need for this is covered and then I spent hours in Chat and on the phone with Zmodo support and in the end they could not provide a solution. So unless you are an Expert IT person, I would not buy this camera until they figure out what is wrong. My suspicion is that they just implemented Zlink software and it is having trouble connecting to certain routers. I am tired and going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hull

customer_reviews.title: So someone could break in and record 30seconds of the nice paint I have on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Dont by with the sensors. Every time my sensor trips its suppose to angle it to the spot I assigned it too, but it spins around at weird angles and records the wall now. So someone could break in and record 30seconds of the nice paint I have on the wall! If you want to come break it, by all means I wont get it on camera, you'll just have to watch out for the 2nd obstacle I have, 2 130lb pure german shepherds!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of app permissions
customer_reviews.text: System was quite a hassle to get up and running. Once on line, it performed as advertised. After a few days lost cloud service and was promised to get back on and never did. Without off site storage, what good is it? Anyone can walk off with unit. Also, the main reason I returned it was the app permissions on the smart phone. It has to be the most invasive intrusion to ones privacy I have ever encountered. Why does this app need to see all contacts, see and alter SMS, bypass the lock screen, erase files in storage and the SD card, etc.!!
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Only works with 2.4 ghz modem, NOT 5.0 ghz
customer_reviews.text: I currently have several models of Zmodo cameras and thought the Pivot would be perfect for my home. Unfortunately, I didn't know before purchasing this model that it only works with a 2.4 ghz modem. After spending endless hours of trying each connection method provided, nothing worked. I used the online chat (which took forever) to find out that this camera will not connect with my 5 ghz modem. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: This camera is easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not difficult to set up. It works well, and I have not had any problems with the app. I even stopped using it for a few months and when I plugged it back it I did not have to set it up again. The only drawback I have found is it would be better if it had a base that you could tilt. If you want to watch something that is higher or lower than the camera's field of view then you will have to put something under one side of the camera or make an uneven platform for this camera to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Deucestrutter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible video quality, poor wi-fi connectivity
customer_reviews.text: These are just awful. Bought three to try to set up as a home surveillance system and had non-stop issues with all three. Getting one bad one would be understandable but all three? Clearly a poor product. Support was ok, they suggested that each issue encountered was a known issue and to just return the devices which we did.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and the security feature
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for around 18 months. So I have a good amount of experience with this. The product is sturdy and of good quality. The mobile app has matured over time for both Android and iOS. The fantastic part are the sensors. Easy maintainance and easy to replace the batteries. Bluetooth on thr main component is good with connectivity. Speakers does a good enough job based on the price tag. Am entitely content on the investment I made. Easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Soumya Kanti Kar

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but does not work and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but does not work and poor customer service. Product was bad on arrival....spent days troubleshooting thinking had time to return. Pivot would disconnect at one spot on turning and be useless. Tried working with zmodo. Now stuck with worthless product. I have to pay to ship it back when it never worked. Like I said I like the idea but arrived not working and likely will end up in trash.
customer_reviews.author: LUTERGUY

customer_reviews.title: Great and Reliable Camera (w/ some fun added features)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera and the 360 rotation ability is great. Had to return the first unit as the extraneous features -- microphone, temp & humidity sensors -- did not function properly. The microphone on the replacement unit is still a bit wonky (excessive background noise), but does pick up sound. Overall, I would buy the Pivot again if it only functioned as a camera. And it's priced well versus the competing products that I researched. The phone app and website functionality are not perfect but they perform above average and have improved in the past couple of versions. There is currently a free trial in effect and subscription cloud-based recording is advertised to be coming soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mels

customer_reviews.title: Abort mission, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Load of garbage, couldn't even get the device past the set up phase. The directions are very vague, the device doesn't connect properly. You go to contact their chat support and a warning messages comes saying their chat service isn't secure and they can't guarantee the safety of your information. Definitely what you want to hear from a company that sold you a security camera hooked to the internet, right? lol
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Styles

customer_reviews.title: Not going to lie, delivers much more than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Taken back a bit at how far tech like this is getting, for 99 bucks, I pretty much eliminated my need for an expensive, not really needed, alarm system. I placed this in a position where it will go off no matter how you enter my house, and that's what I was looking for. Above this, I'm amazed at all the features that are packed in, I really am, I thought it was going to be a lot less than what I got. Get this if you need some peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

customer_reviews.title: Find a better brand.
customer_reviews.text: Aweful quality all around, bad app, bad cloud storage, bad device, terrible customer support, bad brand overall. No way to reset the camera. Very poor quality overall. Would return if I hadn’t already paid for cloud support that hardly works between two cameras with plenty of WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Had the product 4 months worked fine not great
customer_reviews.text: Had the product 4 months worked fine not great... then one day just stopped would not connect to internet after reading review I see this is common. chatted with support tried to do a RMA through Zmodo would not go through because I purchased from prime could not return to prime because 60 days product has a 3 year warranty from Mfr. if you can find a way to return it. Reading review has left me very troubled it appears others can gain access to the device, not secure and who is to say that 3-4 months from now I will again be doing this very frustrating process. A Very Loyal Amazon Prime Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a time but now sending constant alarms when no movement and not sending them when there are people walking in front
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a time, lately unfortunately it decided to send alarms for no visible reason. I check the many many alerts I am getting not finding anything. The alarms go off at different times of day and night and the most I found a couple of times is a change in the amount of light through the window, but mostly nothing. The worst part is that there is no alarm for each time my neighbor did came in the house to feed the cat during the trip. Makes no sense... looking into buying another system.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Csvany

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera overall! Pros: Bluetooth speaker is decent sounding. Does function and alert when the door sensors open. The audio receiving and sending to the device is good. The image quality broadcasted is pretty damn good. Cons: when I tap left or right to control the direction it will just keep going on its own until it goes all the way to the end. this does not happen all the time but it does happen often enough to be annoying. Overall I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Herbert

customer_reviews.title: These cameras are useless.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute Garbage. Live picture lags excessively and makes using it nearly impossible. I have 230mbs download and 15mbs upload and it still does not correct this. The night vision is turned on by relay that constantly clicks loudly on and off all the time. Zmodo cameras are All useless. Do Not Buy...just throwing money away. I would give it -5 Stars if I could. I install, program and debug high speed industrial robotic equipment for a living. I have a C111 Panasonic web camera for years without any issue. Sound on Zmodo app does not work so 2 way communications dont work. I would never buy another Zmodo again of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: FJTrafton

customer_reviews.title: Zmodo Pivot Provides Great Capability at Surprisingly Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I have a Greet door bell and wifi camera in addition to the Pivot. Although I had some initial problems with the Pivot because it did not power on when I plugged in the power adapter, I was able to get past that and it has worked great since then. I really love the overall quality of the Zmodo cameras and how they integrate well together in the mobile app. I will continue to expand with more cameras, best value I've found to date.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Foster

customer_reviews.title: The first one work for three weeks then quit returned ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one work for three weeks then quit returned it and they sent a new one works about three or four days and then stops working after then re-install the device and works for three or four more days and quits again. I'm going to try to return it again and get my money back
customer_reviews.author: R. Burrell

customer_reviews.title: ... say for the price of this camera it's really good. However
customer_reviews.text: I'll say for the price of this camera it's really good. However, it does some issues. I have many false alerts due to outdoor lighting changes someone walking by my glass front door. I also lost video, and subsequently all access to the camera and had to factory reset it to get it all back. On my android app, often I cannot get video with the app trying to establish connection. If I log out, then back into the app, everything is fine - very annoying. All in all though, very nice picture quality and the 360 degree turn action is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch company...
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought this camera it recorded up to a week of video. The new update only lets the camera record up to 24hrs when I originally bought the there was no mention of forcing you to buy a cloud service.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer should have implemented better procedure for the camera to reconnect automatically
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pivot camera for many months now. One big limitation is that Pivot typically wouldn’t reconnect to wifi, after router goes down. It will blink in green and require full wifi setup which is quite confusing and takes several minutes. Zmodo will even have wifi password save. Moreover, it loses the door sensors as well, requiring re-adding. Pure time waste!! Manufacturer should have implemented better procedure for the camera to reconnect automatically.
customer_reviews.author: mibutik

customer_reviews.title: Security Gadget not a Security System but a fun toy nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a security plaything than anything you want to rely on. Don't get me wrong as a gadget freak I love to play around with it. For the price it is a lot of fun. If you want a serious security system please pay for a professional. Operation can be random. It doesn't always rotate on alerts. It still records on motion even when motion alerts are set to "Off". The motion is often triggered by sudden changes of lighting in the room as clouds passing by. product_meta.title: Zmodo Pivot 1080p 360° Rotating Wireless Security Camera and All-in-One Smart Home Hub No Sensor Included
product_meta.description:
Pivot is a connected, rotating all-in-one monitoring solution. With a 1080p camera and 135 degree field-of-view, two-way audio, 16GB of local storage, and 350 degree rotation, Pivot allows you to monitor your entire space. Pivot is also a smart hub for connecting Zmodo smart accessories like the included door and window sensors, and provides temperature and humidity readings for your home. Expand Pivot's coverage easily by purchasing additional sensors to cover your entire home. 

Pivot can be set up and controlled through the Zmodo smartphone app (available for iOS 7 and up and Android 4.0 and up). You can also view your Pivot through the web app by logging in with your Zmodo username and password at user.zmodo.com. Pivot connects to your home's WiFi and requires a password-protected 2.4GHz WiFi network with WPA/WPA2 encryption.
feature_bullets: Cover your entire space with Pivot's wide-angle, rotating 1080p camera. With 16GB of built-in storage, you can record days of video without having to pay additional fees.

Receive alerts on your phone when motion is detected, and customize areas on your live view will trigger a motion detection alert. Temperature and humidity readings, a Bluetooth speaker for music, and two-way audio to talk to family at home, making it a true all-in-one monitoring solution.

Pivot is a hub for Zmodo accessories, and comes with door / window sensors. Once you have configured your sensor to the Pivot, you can use the app to set your Pivot to turn to a specific direction whenever that sensor is triggered.
Set up in minutes with the Zmodo mobile app. Create an account, connect Pivot to your phone. Experience remote viewing and control no matter where you are.
Full 1-Year US Warranty for Zmodo Pivot. Complimentary unlimited US-based technical support included within the warranty.
